original_solution_mapping.L1: Sandy's fingernails will grow a total of ( 0.1 ) * 12 = <<(0.1)*12=1.2>>1.2 inches per year.
original_solution_mapping.L2: To achieve the world record, Sandy needs to grow her fingernails a total of 26 - 2 = <<26-2=24>>24 inches.
original_solution_mapping.L3: It will take her a total of 24 / 1.2 = <<24/1.2=20>>20 years.
original_solution_mapping.L4: Sandy will be 12 + 20 = <<12+20=32>>32 years old when she achieves the world record.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 6786.
    Returns: Sandy's age when she achieves the world record.
    """
    # L1
    growth_rate_per_month = 0.1 # one-tenth of an inch per month
    months_per_year = 12 # WK
    growth_per_year = growth_rate_per_month * months_per_year

    # L2
    world_record_length = 26 # world record for longest fingernails is 26 inches
    current_length = 2 # Her fingernails are 2 inches long
    length_to_grow = world_record_length - current_length

    # L3
    years_to_grow = length_to_grow / growth_per_year

    # L4
    sandy_current_age = 12 # Sandy, who just turned 12 this month
    final_age = sandy_current_age + years_to_grow

    # FA
    answer = final_age
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Sandy's fingernails will grow a total of ( {growth_rate_per_month} ) * {months_per_year} = <<({growth_rate_per_month})*{months_per_year}={growth_per_year}>>{growth_per_year} inches per year.

To achieve the world record, Sandy needs to grow her fingernails a total of {world_record_length} - {current_length} = <<{world_record_length}-{current_length}={length_to_grow}>>{length_to_grow} inches.
It will take her a total of {length_to_grow} / {growth_per_year} = <<{length_to_grow}/{growth_per_year}={years_to_grow}>>{years_to_grow} years.
Sandy will be {sandy_current_age} + {years_to_grow} = <<{sandy_current_age}+{years_to_grow}={final_age}>>{final_age} years old when she achieves the world record.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: Sandy's fingernails will grow a total of ( 0.1 ) * 12 = <<(0.1)*12=1.2>>1.2 inches per year.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: To achieve the world record, Sandy needs to grow her fingernails a total of 26 - 2 = <<26-2=24>>24 inches.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: It will take her a total of 2 / 1.2 = <<2/1.2=1.67>>1.67 years.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L4: Sandy will be 12 + 1.67 = <<12+1.67=13.67>>13.67 years old when she achieves the world record.

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'current_length' (value: 2) was used instead of 'length_to_grow' (value: 24).
